aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Our Heritage & Story
aboutPage.intro: Al-Diwan Al-Yemeni draws its name from the traditional Yemeni Diwan, a historic symbol of generosity, hospitality, and social gathering. The restaurant embodies this rich heritage with a contemporary touch, offering guests an experience steeped in Yemen's cultural legacy and authentic flavors, all within an atmosphere that blends tradition with elegance.

heritage.title: Our Heritage
heritage.content: Al-Diwan Al-Yemeni draws its name from the traditional Yemeni Diwan, a historic symbol of generosity, hospitality, and social gathering. The restaurant embodies this rich heritage with a contemporary touch, offering guests an experience steeped in Yemen's cultural legacy and authentic flavors, all within an atmosphere that blends tradition with elegance.

pioneer.title: Our Restaurants
pioneer.content: Al-Diwan Al-Yemeni is one of the pioneering Yemeni and Gulf restaurants in Jordan and stands out as the first in the country to embrace the authentic traditional Yemeni style. Through its ambiance and design, the restaurant reflects Yemen's rich heritage, offering guests an experience imbued with the country's cultural authenticity and distinctive traditional details.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Our restaurant is proud to have a dedicated and fully integrated Yemeni team committed to delivering the highest standards of service across all departments. From delivery services to the front-of-house staff, customer follow-up, and accounting, every team member contributes to a seamless experience. At the heart of our operation, a distinguished group of chefs exemplifies the restaurant's excellence, bringing authentic Yemeni flavors to life with precision and mastery.

quality.title: Quality
quality.content: We believe that excellence lies in the details. That is why we are committed to upholding the highest standards of quality in everything we offer, ensuring that your experience with us is exceptional and truly reflects the essence of craftsmanship and perfection.

service.title: Service
service.content: We place the highest priority on serving our guests, reflecting the esteemed reputation of our restaurant and honoring the trust of those who visit us. We continuously strive to deliver a refined experience marked by meticulous attention to detail, offering specialized services for events and external catering, always meeting the expectations and sophisticated tastes of our clientele.

diwan.title: Al-Diwan Al-Yemeni
diwan.content:
The name Al-Diwan Al-Yemeni is inspired by the historic concept of the "Diwan" in Yemeni heritage—a symbol of generosity, hospitality, wisdom, and communal gathering. For centuries, the Diwan has served as a center for exchanging news, holding councils, hosting social and cultural meetings, where stories were shared, matters were discussed, and Arabic coffee and dates were offered as tokens of authenticity and welcome, making it the vibrant heart of Yemeni society.

The Diwan has long been intertwined with Yemen's rich history, serving as a meeting place for families and community leaders, a venue for important decisions, and a hub for poets, scholars, and artisans who passed down Yemeni traditions through generations. Traditional Yemeni Diwans embody a sense of heritage and dignity: open and communal spaces that simultaneously offer warmth and a personal touch, blending social values with the cultural and artistic spirit that has defined Yemen across centuries.

Drawing from this deep-rooted cultural legacy, Al-Diwan Al-Yemeni Restaurant carries the Diwan's name and identity, extending its historic essence into a modern setting. Every detail—from the architectural design to the dining experience—reflects the traditional spirit of the Yemeni Diwan, immersing guests in an atmosphere rich with authenticity and heritage. Each visit offers a complete experience that combines elegance and warmth, connecting the richness of Yemeni culture with visitors seeking a genuine journey through the traditions and timeless charm of Yemen.
